sqlMap.select: select ID , UABZUCSL, YAOHJSRQ, GONGYSDM, lingjbh, DINGDH, USERCENTER, UABZUCRL, UABZUCLX, GONGYSLX, UABZLX, YAOHQSRQ, CANGKDM, SHUL, DANW, GONGHLX, DINGHCJ, LINGJSX from ${dbSchemal1}xqjs_yugzjb where 1=1

select yug.dingdh as dingdh , yug.usercenter as usercenter , yug.gongysdm as gongysdm , yug.lingjbh as lingjbh , yug.yaohqsrq as yaohqsrq , yug.yaohjsrq as yaohjsrq , sum(yug.shul) as shul, min(yug.cangkdm) as cangkdm, min(yug.gonghlx) as gonghlx from ${dbSchemal1}xqjs_yugzjb yug group by yug.dingdh, yug.usercenter, yug.gongysdm, yug.lingjbh, yug.yaohqsrq, yug.yaohjsrq order by yug.yaohqsrq
sqlMap.insert: insert into ${dbSchemal1}xqjs_yugzjb ( UABZUCSL, YAOHJSRQ, GONGYSDM, ID, lingjbh, USERCENTER, UABZUCRL, UABZUCLX, GONGYSLX, UABZLX, YAOHQSRQ, CANGKDM, SHUL, DANW, P0FYZQXH, ZQXH, GONGHLX, DINGHCJ, LINGJSX ) values ( #uabzucsl#, #yaohjsrq#, #gongysdm#, #id#, #lingjbh#, #usercenter#, #uabzucrl#, #uabzuclx#, #gongyslx#, #uabzlx#, #yaohqsrq#, #cangkdm#, #shul#, #danw#, #p0fyzqxh#, #zqxh#, #gonghlx#, #dinghcj#, #lingjsx# )
sqlMap.update:
update ${dbSchemal1}xqjs_yugzjb set UABZUCSL=#uabzucsl#, YAOHJSRQ=#yaohjsrq#, GONGYSDM=#gongysdm#, ID=#id#, lingjbh=#lingjbh#, DINGDH=#dingdh#, USERCENTER=#usercenter#, UABZUCRL=#uabzucrl#, UABZUCLX=#uabzuclx#, GONGYSLX=#gongyslx#, UABZLX=#uabzlx#, YAOHQSRQ=#yaohqsrq#, CANGKDM=#cangkdm#, SHUL=#shul#, DANW=#danw#, GONGHLX=#gonghlx# where 1=1
ID = #id#
sqlMap.select:
select t.USERCENTER, t.GONGYSDM, t.GONGYSLX, t.LINGJBH, t.GONGHLX, sum(decode(to_char(add_months( to_date(#nianzq#,'yyyymm'),0),'yyyymm'),t.zqxh,t.shul,0)) as p0sl, sum(decode(to_char(add_months( to_date(#nianzq#,'yyyymm'),1),'yyyymm'),t.zqxh,t.shul,0)) as p1sl, sum(decode(to_char(add_months( to_date(#nianzq#,'yyyymm'),2),'yyyymm'),t.zqxh,t.shul,0)) as p2sl, sum(decode(to_char(add_months( to_date(#nianzq#,'yyyymm'),3),'yyyymm'),t.zqxh,t.shul,0)) as p3sl, t.DANW, t.UABZLX, t.UABZUCLX, t.UABZUCSL, t.UABZUCRL, t.P0FYZQXH, t.DINGHCJ, t.LINGJSX from ${dbSchemal1}XQJS_YUGZJB t where 1=1
USERCENTER = #usercenter#
LINGJBH = #lingjbh#
GONGYSDM = #gongysdm#
group by t.USERCENTER, t.GONGYSDM, t.GONGYSLX, t.LINGJBH, t.GONGHLX, t.DANW, t.UABZLX, t.UABZUCLX, t.UABZUCSL, t.UABZUCRL, t.P0FYZQXH, t.DINGHCJ, t.LINGJSX

select t.USERCENTER, t.GONGYSDM, t.GONGYSLX, t.LINGJBH, t.GONGHLX, t.DANW, t.UABZLX, t.UABZUCLX, t.UABZUCSL, t.UABZUCRL, t.P0FYZQXH, t.DINGHCJ, t.LINGJSX from ${dbSchemal1}XQJS_YUGZJB t where 1=1 group by t.USERCENTER, t.GONGYSDM, t.GONGYSLX, t.LINGJBH, t.GONGHLX, t.DANW, t.UABZLX, t.UABZUCLX, t.UABZUCSL, t.UABZUCRL, t.P0FYZQXH, t.DINGHCJ, t.LINGJSX

select t.USERCENTER, t.GONGYSDM, t.GONGYSLX, t.LINGJBH, t.GONGHLX, sum(decode(#nianzx#,t.zqxh,t.shul,0)) as p0sl, sum(decode(#nianzx1#,t.zqxh,t.shul,0)) as p1sl, sum(decode(#nianzx2#,t.zqxh,t.shul,0)) as p2sl, sum(decode(#nianzx3#,t.zqxh,t.shul,0)) as p3sl, t.DANW, t.UABZLX, t.UABZUCLX, t.UABZUCSL, t.UABZUCRL, t.P0FYZQXH, t.DINGHCJ, t.LINGJSX from ${dbSchemal1}XQJS_YUGZJB t where 1=1
USERCENTER = #usercenter#
LINGJBH = #lingjbh#
GONGYSDM = #gongysdm#
group by t.USERCENTER, t.GONGYSDM, t.GONGYSLX, t.LINGJBH, t.GONGHLX, t.DANW, t.UABZLX, t.UABZUCLX, t.UABZUCSL, t.UABZUCRL, t.P0FYZQXH, t.DINGHCJ, t.LINGJSX

select t.USERCENTER, t.GONGYSDM, t.GONGYSLX, t.LINGJBH, t.GONGHLX, sum(decode(to_date(substr(#j0rq#,1,10),'yyyy-mm-dd'),t.yaohqsrq, t.shul,0)) as P0SL, sum(decode(to_date(substr(#j1rq#,1,10),'yyyy-mm-dd'),t.yaohqsrq, t.shul,0)) as P1SL, sum(decode(to_date(substr(#j2rq#,1,10),'yyyy-mm-dd'),t.yaohqsrq, t.shul,0)) as P2SL, sum(decode(to_date(substr(#j3rq#,1,10),'yyyy-mm-dd'),t.yaohqsrq, t.shul,0)) as P3SL, sum(decode(to_date(substr(#j4rq#,1,10),'yyyy-mm-dd'),t.yaohqsrq, t.shul,0)) as P4SL, sum(decode(to_date(substr(#j5rq#,1,10),'yyyy-mm-dd'),t.yaohqsrq, t.shul,0)) as P5SL, sum(decode(to_date(substr(#j6rq#,1,10),'yyyy-mm-dd'),t.yaohqsrq, t.shul,0)) as P6SL, sum(decode(to_date(substr(#j7rq#,1,10),'yyyy-mm-dd'),t.yaohqsrq, t.shul,0)) as P7SL, sum(decode(to_date(substr(#j8rq#,1,10),'yyyy-mm-dd'),t.yaohqsrq, t.shul,0)) as P8SL, sum(decode(to_date(substr(#j9rq#,1,10),'yyyy-mm-dd'),t.yaohqsrq, t.shul,0)) as P9SL, #j1rq# as P1RQ, #j2rq# as P2RQ, #j3rq# as P3RQ, #j4rq# as P4RQ, #j5rq# as P5RQ, #j6rq# as P6RQ, #j7rq# as P7RQ, #j8rq# as P8RQ, #j9rq# as P9RQ, t.DANW, t.UABZLX, t.UABZUCLX, t.UABZUCSL, t.UABZUCRL,
t.DINGHCJ, t.LINGJSX from ${dbSchemal1}XQJS_YUGZJB t where 1=1
USERCENTER = #usercenter#
LINGJBH = #lingjbh#
GONGYSDM = #gongysdm#
group by t.USERCENTER, t.GONGYSDM, t.GONGYSLX, t.LINGJBH, t.GONGHLX, t.DANW, t.UABZLX, t.UABZUCLX, t.UABZUCSL, t.UABZUCRL,
t.DINGHCJ, t.LINGJSX

select t.USERCENTER, t.GONGYSDM, t.GONGYSLX, t.LINGJBH, t.GONGHLX, t.DANW, t.UABZLX, t.UABZUCLX, t.UABZUCSL, t.UABZUCRL,
t.DINGHCJ, t.LINGJSX from ${dbSchemal1}XQJS_YUGZJB t group by t.USERCENTER, t.GONGYSDM, t.GONGYSLX, t.LINGJBH, t.GONGHLX, t.DANW, t.UABZLX, t.UABZUCLX, t.UABZUCSL, t.UABZUCRL,
t.DINGHCJ, t.LINGJSX

select t.yaohqsrq from ${dbSchemal1}XQJS_YUGZJB t where 1=1
USERCENTER = #usercenter#
LINGJBH = #lingjbh#
CANGKDM = #cangkdm#
GONGYSDM = #gongysdm#
order by t.yaohqsrq
